timeline.message:
Add Retire.js Addon

- New add-on with passive scanner based on RetireJS/retire.js.
- Basic UnitTest.
- Basic help entry.
- Icon taken from https://github.com/RetireJS profile image (globe with
shield). Included at "normal" 128x128 and resized 16x16.
- GitHub Action to create update PRs once a month. (Pattern updates only
seem to occur once or twice a month in recent history
https://github.com/RetireJS/retire.js/commits/master/repository . A
manual update can always be done if necessary.)

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

Use gson to parse the Retire.js JSON input collection

Rework code to use gson so there's no need to worry about unchecked
conversions.

Model partially generated leveraging http://www.jsonschema2pojo.org/

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: I tried adding a UnitTest for this leveraging this.nano.addHandler and reading a file like we do with ascanrules but kept running into an NPE. I then tried adding it as an inline string but it's >65KB and wouldn't let me.
timeline.author: kingthorin

timeline.bodyText: Add br or p (same before the note)? They are all shown in the same line/paragraph.
timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@ + + + + +Retire.js + + + +

Retire.js

+ +This add-on includes a passive scan rule which implements checks provided by Retire.js +in order to identify vulnerable or out-dated JavaScript packages. +

timeline.bodyText:
23200 [AWT-EventQueue-0] ERROR org.zaproxy.zap.control.AddOnInstaller  - Declared bundle not found in retire add-on:
java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find bundle for base name org.zaproxy.addon.retire.resources.help%LC%.helpset, locale en_GB
	at java.base/java.util.ResourceBundle.throwMissingResourceException(ResourceBundle.java:2055)
timeline.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText: I had, had the localeToken.set but in the a bundle section and it wouldn't import. Now I "think" I'm clear on how it works. Thanks!
replies.author: kingthorin
